title: Holiday Greeting + Discount Offer
description: For high-value customers, send greetings and discounts during holidays
template: Dear ${name}, Happy ${holidayName}! Thank you for spending over ${minSpend} dollars in the past. We are pleased to offer you an exclusive ${discount}% discount on our facelift services. Don't miss this opportunity, valid for two weeks only.

title: Post-Operation Follow-Up + Reactivation
description: Recommended maintenance projects for customers 1-2 years after surgery
template: Hello ${name}, it has been ${monthsSince} months since your last ${lastProcedure}. To maintain the best results, we invite you to experience follow-up projects with a ${discount}% discount.
